Description: Icon Health & Fitness Inc., of Logan, Utah, agreed to pay a civil penalty of $500,000 to resolvea lawsuit alleging that it failed to report serious safety hazards associated with home exercise equipment.

ICON Health & Fitness, Inc. and its related entities agreed to pay $3 million in civil penalties to settle FTC charges that the companies violated the Commission's 1997 consent order by advertising that use of their exercise equipment for just three minutes a day would result in significant weight loss.
